oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General Bragg's Headquarters, Missionary Ridge, near Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted and enhanced photograph of a section of Missionary Ridge known as General Bragg's Headquarters. An unpaved road leads to monuments and a tower surrounded by trees. Features a white border, divided back, and narrative on reverse. [No.5810] This postcard comes from the Tennessee Historical Society Collection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Monuments & memorials; Towers; Trees
